contest-event.event-date: Oct. 19, 1968 D National Mineworkers (Third Section) National Mineworkers (Third Section) 30 Test Piece Contest National Mineworkers Contest national-mineworkers-third-section This contest became the Butlins Mineworkers Contest in 2003. Third Yorkshire Ridings Suite Winter Gardens (Pavilion Theatre), Blackpool, Lancashire, England, UK 13 bands competed. 7th annual contest March 5, 2011, 10 p.m. June 14, 2020, 11:18 a.m. 1 NASUWT Riverside George Holden 2 Shirland Welfare Band Doug Carlin 3 Ammanford Silver Band Haydn Morris 4 Calverton Colliery Welfare Norman Brown Unknown Result Emley Brass Band Charlie Westerby Unknown Result Grimethorpe Colliery Junior Band Winston Moore Unknown Result Northumbrian Water Ellington Colliery A. Cowton Unknown Result Dearham Band Joe Ireland Unknown Result Snowdown Colliery Welfare Band S. A.
